name: Full screen ad
author: Andrea De Giovine

sections.description:
The “Full screen ad” plugin helps you increase the earnings and conversions of your WordPress website.

Easily create full screen ads to show to your website visitors.

You can set the frequency and the waiting time of the announcement when it is shown.

Several filters are available to customize the functions of the plugin, for example it is possible to modify the list of bots to be excluded from the display of the ad.

The developer works to improve the performance of the plugin, if you like it leave a 5 star review or send a donation, if you want to report a bug visit the support section.

Full screen ad development

Using the “Full screen ad” plugin you will have some filter that you can use:

  • apply_filters(‘full_screen_ad_bot’, ‘bot|crawl|spider|mediapartners|slurp|patrol’)

Do you need other functions? Ask the developer from the support section.

Full screen ad credits

The “Full screen ad” plugin was entirely designed and created by Andrea De Giovine.
If you like the idea and want to support the developer, please donate to this plugin.
For collaborations and consultations visit the website of the freelance web developer.
For bug reports and support for this plugin, visit the support section to ask the developer and the community directly.
sections.installation:
To automatically install the “Full screen ad” plugin you can search from the “Plugins > Add new” section of your WordPress dashboard and click on the “Install Now” button corresponding to this plugin.

To manually install the “Full screen ad” plugin you can download the latest version from the WordPress.org site, and unpack the zip file in the “wp-content/plugins” folder of your CMS.

Now on the “Plugins” section of your WordPress dashboard you can see the “Full screen ad” plugin, click on “Activate”.
sections.faq:
How to use this plugin?

Download and install the latest version, then from the settings page you can customize your full screen ad.

What type of ad can I set up?

You can create text, html, shortcode or image ads.

Can I set a frequency and a duration?

Absolutely yes.

Does this plugin penalize the SEO of my site?

Absolutely no.

short_description: The only plugin that allows you to easily create a timed full-screen ad.
